title: Is McDonald's hamburger 100%?
subtitle: Rumor has it that McDonalds buys their meat from a company called '100% beef' which allows them to claim legally but in a tricky way that they use 100% beef in their hamburgers.
author: Snopes Staff
vclaim: McDonald's buys their meat from a company called "100% beef," which allows them to legally claim, but in a tricky way, they use 100% beef in their hamburgers.
